nodes.text: Andelm beetles were a species of beetle native to Andelm IV. Their larvae contained certain rare organics that could be used to power blasters. Andelm beetles traveled in a swarm and were dangerous to sentient beings in large numbers. Following the Battle of Yavin, the crime lord Jaum ran a mining operation at the Andelm beetle caverns. He used debtors as slaves to work his mines.
